amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for tax enforcement activities of the IRS by $353 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment reduces funding for tax enforcement activities of the IRS by $353 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
